name: Citbix
description:
This is a beta preview. It's a 2d action puzzle platformer - use arrow keys and space bar - no jumping you just drop them bricks!

Whats to come in future updates?

Character Select
Better graphics sound and music
More levels
Tweeked game play
Android and IOS version

follow me on twitter for latest updates and news
@moyastudiosnet
#citbix screenshot of your high score
